REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0153 reute d f BC-DIASONIWS-<DNC>-SAYS 03-12 0059

TEXT.TITLE: DIASONIWS <DNC> SAYS IMAGING SYSTEM APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: Diasonics Inc said the U.S. Food and Drug Administration has given premarket approval to <Instrumentarium Corp> of Finland's ULF magnetic resonance imaging system. Diasonics already distributes the system in several countries and will distribute it in the U.S. as well. Reuter
